Today in Pembrokeshire, it's a bit rough with 5 ft @11s WSW swell and fresh 20 mph WSW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions improve significantly with 5 ft @9s WSW and light 8 mph W winds, creating clean surf at spots like Whitesands Bay. The day after, the swell drops slightly to 4 ft @9s WSW with a gentle 11 mph S wind, still offering fun waves. Best: tomorrow.
